bibl.title: New Evidence for the Roman Garrison of Trimithis.
bibl.note: Present the information provided by ostraka from Trimithis about the imperial military presence and publish a dipinto with a 3-line Greek text discovered in 2011 on a wall of a large public bath (Amheida Dipinto, Inv. 14441, sometime after 325).
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & Roger S. Bagnall, New Evidence for the Roman Garrison of Trimithis.

Present the information provided by ostraka from Trimithis about the imperial military presence and publish a dipinto with a 3-line Greek text discovered in 2011 on a wall of a large public bath (Amheida Dipinto, Inv. 14441, sometime after 325).
